argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cvsdiv.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | cvsdiv.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_cvsdiv | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> ( A / B ) = ( A ( /r ` F ) B ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> W e. CVec ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_cvslvec | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> W e. LVec ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_lvecdrng | |- ( W e. LVec -> F e. DivRing ) |
| 7 |  | #P_drngring | |- ( F e. DivRing -> F e. Ring ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> F e. Ring ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpr1 | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> A e. K ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr2 | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> B e. K ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simpr3 | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> B =/= 0 ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eldifsn | |- ( B e. ( K \ { 0 } ) <-> ( B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 11, 12 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> B e. ( K \ { 0 } ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 2 | #P_cvsunit | |- ( W e. CVec -> ( K \ { 0 } ) = ( Unit ` F ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> ( K \ { 0 } ) = ( Unit ` F ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> B e. ( Unit ` F ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` F ) = ( Unit ` F ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( /r ` F ) = ( /r ` F ) |
| 19 | 2, 17, 18 | #P_dvrcl | |- ( ( F e. Ring /\ A e. K /\ B e. ( Unit ` F ) ) -> ( A ( /r ` F ) B ) e. K ) |
| 20 | 8, 9, 16, 19 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> ( A ( /r ` F ) B ) e. K ) |
| 21 | 3, 20 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( W e. CVec /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> ( A / B ) e. K ) |
